decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble and cast a high storm count to win the game using cards like Dark Ritual, Lion's Eye Diamond, and Tendrils of Agony. The deck utilizes powerful mana acceleration and card draw to streamline the combo and stay ahead of the opponent. Agadeem's Awakening and Entomb help find key combo pieces, while disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy help protect the combo. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a lethal storm count and finish them off with Tendrils of Agony for a game-winning combo finish.

The deck revolves around quickly ramping into casting powerful spells like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Omniscience through the combo card Show and Tell. It uses cards like Brainstorm, Force of Will, and Veil of Summer to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategies. The main goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats before they can effectively respond. Additionally, the deck includes tutors like Cunning Wish and Impulse to help find key pieces when needed.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent to apply pressure on the opponent. It aims to control the board with disruptive spells like Wasteland, Daze, and Force of Will while also maintaining card advantage through cards like Mishra's Bauble and Brainstorm. The inclusion of counter spells and removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat help in protecting and clearing the way for its threats. The deck aims to quickly close out games by overwhelming the opponent with a combination of creatures and spells.

The main concept of this deck is to generate a lot of card advantage and mana acceleration to control the board and outvalue the opponent. It utilizes artifacts like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble alongside powerful cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga to create a strong presence on the battlefield. With cards like Force of Will for protection and Thoughtcast for card draw, the deck aims to control the game until it can assemble a winning combination or overpower the opponent with its resources.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly flood the board with artifact creatures and utilize cards like Mox Opal and Lotus Petal for fast mana generation. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Chalice of the Void and Metallic Rebuke, while also benefiting from Urza's Saga to tutor for key artifacts. Additionally, the deck includes synergistic cards like Thought Monitor and Patchwork Automaton to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The strategy revolves around aggressive artifact-based plays and efficient mana ramp to overwhelm the opponent early on.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, then using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with these high-powered creatures early in the game, creating a strong board presence and putting pressure on them to find answers quickly. The key strategy is to efficiently utilize graveyard reanimation spells to cheat powerful creatures into play and win the game before the opponent can establish their own board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and disruptive spells to quickly establish board presence and pressure the opponent. It leverages cards like Noble Hierarch, Knight of the Reliquary, and Questing Beast to quickly build a threatening board state, while also running disruptive cards like Swords to Plowshares and Gaddock Teeg to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Once Upon a Time allow for consistent deck searching and card advantage, while cards like Wasteland and Collector Ouphe disrupt the opponent's mana base and artifacts.

This deck aims to quickly generate mana and draw cards to set up for a powerful combo turn, using cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal to accelerate into spells like Dark Ritual and Burning Wish. The key strategy is to build up storm count and then finish off the opponent with Tendrils of Agony or another storm spell. Utilizing cards like Echo of Eons and Beseech the Mirror to refill the hand and find key pieces, this deck is designed to be fast and efficient in executing its game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's mana base and establish a dominant board presence through aggressive creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Broadside Bombardiers. It utilizes cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while also using cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to accelerate its own game plan. The deck aims to control the game early on and quickly close out the game with its aggressive creatures and burn spells.
